tool_description: Portfolio  & whales  multi-chain tracker. Get Net worth, Coins  & NFTs on wallets, History, Trade signals (short/long) and Pools/Staking and more
title: ₿ Crypto Whale Tracker 🚀

api_list.name: Address history
api_list.description:
Get activity history of specific address

Supported chains:
eth, bsc, arb, op, matic, avax, ftm, xdai

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the transaction history for the wallet 0x5a3b9c8d7e4f2a1b6c9d8e7f0a1b2c3d4e5f6a7b on the Binance Smart Chain?
I need the activity log for the address 0x9f8e7d6c5b4a3e2f1d0c9b8a7e6d5c4b3a2f1e0d on the Polygon network.
Please retrieve the transaction history for 0x3c2b1a0f9e8d7c6b5a4f3e2d1c0b9a8f7e6d5c4b on the Avalanche blockchain.
Show me the past activities of the wallet 0x7e6d5c4b3a2f1e0d9c8b7a6f5e4d3c2b1a0f9e8d on the Fantom network.
Could you provide the transaction history for address 0x1a2b3c4d5e6f7a8b9c0d1e2f3a4b5c6d7e8f9a0b on the Ethereum chain?
I want to see the activity history for 0x0f1e2d3c4b5a69788766554433221100ffeeddcc on the Arbitrum network.
Get the transaction records for the wallet 0xaabbccddeeff00112233445566778899aabbccdd on the Optimism chain.
Please fetch the activity history of 0x99887766554433221100ffeeddccbbaa99887766 on the xDai network.
Can you provide the transaction history for the address 0xabcdef1234567890fedcba0987654321abcdef12 on the Binance Smart Chain?
I would like to see the past activities of wallet 0x1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef12345678 on the Polygon blockchain.

api_list.name: Address net worth sparklines

api_list.name: Whale portfolios
api_list.description:
Get huge whale portfolios
pagination example: ?start=0&limit=20

utterances.utterance: Can you show me a list of the largest crypto whale portfolios right now?
I want to see the top whale portfolios with the biggest holdings in the market.
Please provide details on the most significant whale portfolios currently tracked.
Could you fetch the portfolios of the biggest crypto whales for me?
Show me the portfolios of whales with the highest net worth in crypto assets.
List the major whale portfolios that hold large amounts of coins and NFTs.
Give me an overview of the largest whale portfolios across multiple blockchains.
I want to check out the portfolios of whales who have huge crypto holdings.
Retrieve the biggest whale portfolios that are currently active in the market.
Can you display the portfolios of crypto whales with massive asset values?

api_list.name: Trade signals

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the latest trade signals sorted by their USD value?
I want to see trade signals ordered by the time they were recorded.
Please provide the trade signals sorted from highest to lowest USD value.
List the trade signals starting with the most recent ones first.
Could you fetch trade signals sorted by the amount in USD?
Show me the trade signals sorted by the timestamp of the trades.
I need the trade signals arranged by their USD value in descending order.
Get the trade signals sorted by the exact time they occurred.
Display trade signals prioritized by their USD value.
Retrieve trade signals sorted by the date and time they happened.
